mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into d_entrust_info(id,init_date,curr_date,curr_time,entrust_no,op_branch_no,operator_no,op_entrust_way,op_station,batch_no,branch_no,fund_account,client_id,otcexch_type,otc_account,otcreport_account,seat_no,prop_seat_no,otc_code,otc_name,otc_type,entrust_amount,entrust_price,inv_promise_no,otc_promise_no,otc_prop,report_time,report_no,record_no,business_price,business_amount,withdraw_amount,business_balance,clear_balance,prev_balance,report_bs,store_unit,report_unit,error_no,entrust_status,money_type,client_group,room_code,cancel_serialno,otcfare_kind,position_str) values(#{id},#{initDate},#{currDate},#{currTime},#{entrustNo},#{opBranchNo},#{operatorNo},#{opEntrustWay},#{opStation},#{batchNo},#{branchNo},#{fundAccount},#{clientId},#{otcexchType},#{otcAccount},#{otcreportAccount},#{seatNo},#{propSeatNo},#{otcCode},#{otcName},#{otcType},#{entrustAmount},#{entrustPrice},#{invPromiseNo},#{otcPromiseNo},#{otcProp},#{reportTime},#{reportNo},#{recordNo},#{businessPrice},#{businessAmount},#{withdrawAmount},#{businessBalance},#{clearBalance},#{prevBalance},#{reportBs},#{storeUnit},#{reportUnit},#{errorNo},#{entrustStatus},#{moneyType},#{clientGroup},#{roomCode},#{cancelSerialno},#{otcfareKind},#{positionStr})
mapper.update:
update d_entrust_info
id=#{id},
init_date=#{init_date},
curr_date=#{curr_date},
curr_time=#{curr_time},
entrust_no=#{entrust_no},
op_branch_no=#{op_branch_no},

otcreport_account=#{otcreport_account},
seat_no=#{seat_no},
prop_seat_no=#{prop_seat_no},
otc_code=#{otc_code},
otc_name=#{otc_name},
otc_type=#{otc_type},
entrust_amount=#{entrust_amount},
entrust_price=#{entrust_price},
inv_promise_no=#{inv_promise_no},
otc_promise_no=#{otc_promise_no},
otc_prop=#{otc_prop},
report_time=#{report_time},
report_no=#{report_no},
record_no=#{record_no},
business_price=#{business_price},
business_amount=#{business_amount},
withdraw_amount=#{withdraw_amount},
business_balance=#{business_balance},
clear_balance=#{clear_balance},
prev_balance=#{prev_balance},
report_bs=#{report_bs},
store_unit=#{store_unit},
report_unit=#{report_unit},
error_no=#{error_no},
entrust_status=#{entrust_status},
money_type=#{money_type},
client_group=#{client_group},
room_code=#{room_code},
cancel_serialno=#{cancel_serialno},
otcfare_kind=#{otcfare_kind},
position_str=#{position_str},
where id=#{id}

delete from d_entrust_info where id in
#{item.id}
